nodes.bodyText: Can you rename BoundAndOptimizedStatement in all places to firstLowerCase?
I think a try-with-resources would be better, in case we raise an exception for instance.
Shouldn't this always be 0, since the test is Serial?
Theoretically.  But the user may be doing something else on the machine.  If they have another running operation in a user session I don't want it to raise a false alarm in this test.
